line.comment: * $Index = get index of $Selected.Scope in array $Values.Scope offset=0
* add value selection to menu: $Menu, text='Scope', value array=$Values.Scope, default=$Index, return id='Scope'
* Ship size - changed by ZH2.0 to DPS
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Shields', alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth7
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Laser', alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth11
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Guns', alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth13
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Size', alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth14
* display subtitle text: text=$Text duration=200000 ms
* Add-Ons 1.2: Ship variants are colored as follows: base version = gray, variant = cyan, advanced variant = magenta, red = locked (upcoming insane 1.3 where TS/TP research is disabled)
* Add-Ons 1.3: On insane, TS and TP are color-coded red (signifying that they're not available via crafting).
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $ShieldString, alignment= 1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth7
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $LaserStrength, alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth11
* $Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $Guns, alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth13

sval.val: $Index = get index of $Selected.Scope in array $Values.Scope offset=0
add value selection to menu: $Menu, text='Scope', value array=$Values.Scope, default=$Index, return id='Scope'
Ship size - changed by ZH2.0 to DPS
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Shields', alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth7
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Laser', alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth11
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Guns', alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth13
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= 'Size', alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth14
display subtitle text: text=$Text duration=200000 ms
Add-Ons 1.2: Ship variants are colored as follows: base version = gray, variant = cyan, advanced variant = magenta, red = locked (upcoming insane 1.3 where TS/TP research is disabled)
Add-Ons 1.3: On insane, TS and TP are color-coded red (signifying that they're not available via crafting).
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $ShieldString, alignment= 1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth7
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $LaserStrength, alignment= -1, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth11
$Text = columnize menu text: array= $Text, text= $Guns, alignment= 0, colour= null, column width= $ColumnWidth13
